pages.about: About Us - EcoWear India EcoWear Menu Home About Products Contacts About us A great studio.Fueled by coffee. At EcoWear, we are passionate about creating fashion that respects the planet. Join us in our mission to make the world a better place through sustainable fashion. Our Values Sustainability First We prioritize sustainable practices in every aspect of our business, from sourcing materials to packaging and delivery. Quality and Durability Our products are designed to last, reducing the need for frequent replacements and minimizing waste. Community Engagement We believe in giving back to our community and actively engage in initiatives that promote environmental awareness. Transparency We maintain transparency in our operations, ensuring our customers know exactly how and where their products are made. Innovation We continually seek innovative ways to improve our products and reduce our environmental impact. EcoWear T-Shirts Made from 100% organic cotton. Soft, durable, and environmentally friendly. EcoWear Bags Stylish and sustainable bags made from recycled materials. EcoWear Jackets Warm, stylish, and made from eco-friendly materials. EcoWear Accessories Unique accessories crafted with care for the environment. EcoWear Kids Eco-friendly clothing for children, made from soft and sustainable materials. EcoWear Home Eco-friendly home decor items crafted from recycled materials. EcoWear Sports Sustainable sportswear designed for comfort and performance. EcoWear Travel Eco-friendly travel accessories for the conscious traveler. Our Approach How we create sustainable fashion 01 Design with Purpose Every product is designed with sustainability in mind, ensuring minimal environmental impact. 02 Source Responsibly We source materials that are organic, recycled, and sustainably produced. 03 Craft with Care Our products are crafted with attention to detail and a commitment to quality. 04 Deliver with Integrity We ensure our products are delivered in eco-friendly packaging and with minimal carbon footprint. Our Philosophy Fashion with a conscience At EcoWear, we believe that fashion can be beautiful, comfortable, and sustainable. Our mission is to create eco-friendly clothing and accessories that make a positive impact on the environment. Join us in our journey towards a greener future. Together, we can make a difference. FAQs Your questions answered What materials do you use? We use organic cotton, recycled polyester, and other sustainable materials to create our products. How do you ensure product quality? Our products undergo rigorous quality checks to ensure they meet our high standards of durability and sustainability. What is your return policy? We offer a 30-day return policy for unworn and undamaged products. For more details, please visit our Returns & Exchanges page. How can I place a custom order? To place a custom order, please contact us directly via email or phone. We will be happy to assist you with your specific requirements. Do you ship internationally? Yes, we offer international shipping. Please visit our Shipping Information page for more details on rates and delivery times. Are your products ethically made? Go to the form We are a design agency based in Houston building beautiful brands that people love, and give old brands a refresh. © EcoWear Privacy Policy Terms Conditions Links Home About Products Contacts Contacts eco-wear@gmail.com +91-904-5948576 Subscribe to our newsletter and follow us on social media for the latest updates on new products, promotions, and sustainability news.
pages.index: EcoWear India - Sustainable Fashion and Accessories EcoWear Menu Home About Products Contacts We are EcoWear, an eco-friendly fashion store based in New Delhi. We offer sustainable clothing and accessories that are good for you and the planet.Learn more Our Products EcoWear T-Shirts Made from 100% organic cotton. Soft, durable, and environmentally friendly. EcoWear Bags Stylish and sustainable bags made from recycled materials. EcoWear Jackets Warm, stylish, and made from eco-friendly materials. EcoWear Accessories Unique accessories crafted with care for the environment. Who we are EcoWear is a pioneering sustainable fashion brand committed to making a positive impact on the environment. Join us in our journey towards a greener future. Since 2024 Committed to sustainability Our Team A dedicated team of eco-conscious fashion enthusiasts. Testimonials EcoWear helped me find stylish clothes that I can feel good about wearing. Their commitment to sustainability is inspiring. Aman P Customer EcoWear offers the best sustainable fashion choices. Jamie L Customer Sustainability EcoWear is committed to reducing our carbon footprint and promoting sustainable fashion. We believe in transparency and ethical practices at every stage of our production process. From sourcing materials to delivering the final product, we strive to minimize our environmental impact. Our Services What we offer At EcoWear, we provide a range of eco-friendly fashion products and accessories, ensuring high quality and sustainability. Sustainable Fashion Our clothing is made from organic and recycled materials. We prioritize sustainable practices in every aspect of our production. Eco-Friendly Accessories Our accessories are crafted from environmentally friendly materials, combining style with sustainability. Custom Orders We offer custom orders for eco-friendly clothing and accessories. Contact us for more details. Community Engagement We actively engage with our community to promote sustainable fashion and raise awareness about environmental issues. Educational Workshops We host workshops to educate people about sustainable fashion and eco-friendly living. Insights Our latest news and ideas Partnership 3/10/24 New Partnership with GreenEarth We are excited to announce our partnership with GreenEarth to further our mission of promoting sustainable fashion. Case Study 4/12/24 Launching a New Eco-Friendly Line Discover how we developed our latest line of eco-friendly clothing and accessories. Team Update 5/20/24 EcoWear Welcomes New Sustainability Officer Meet our new Sustainability Officer who will help us enhance our green practices. Contact Us Write to us Get in touch Fill out the form to the right and we will get back to you soon. Prefer email? Feel free to send us a message directly. Email eco-wear@gmail.com Phone +91-904-5948576 Location 5/170, Dr Bhim Rao Ambedkar Rd, Humayunpur, Safdarjung Enclave, New Delhi, Delhi 110029 Name* Email* Message* I accept Privacy policy Thanks, we will be in touch soon. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - EcoWear India EcoWear Menu Home About Products Contacts Privacy Policy Welcome to EcoWear India. We value your privacy and strive to protect your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information we collect, how we use it, and the steps we take to safeguard your data. 1. Information Collection We collect personal information that you provide to us when you use our website, including your name, email address, phone number, and payment information. 2. Use of Information We use the information collected to process your orders, improve our services, and communicate with you about your purchases and our promotions. 3. Information Sharing We do not share your personal information with third parties except as necessary to provide our services or as required by law. 4. Data Security We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. 5. Cookies Our website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience. You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings. 6. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these sites. 7. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. To exercise these rights, please contact us at the provided email address. 8. Changes to Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on our website. 9. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at +91-904-5948576 or eco-wear@gmail.com 10. Consent By using our website, you consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms. 11. Children's Privacy We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 13. If we learn that we have collected such information, we will delete it promptly. 12. Data Retention We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. 13. Governing Law This Privacy Policy is governed by the laws of India. Any disputes arising from this policy will be resolved in accordance with Indian law. 14. International Users If you are accessing our website from outside India, please be aware that your information may be transferred to, stored, and processed in India where our servers are located. 15. Updates and Notifications We will notify you of any changes to our Privacy Policy by posting the updated policy on our website. We encourage you to review this policy periodically. We are a design agency based in Houston building beautiful brands that people love, and give old brands a refresh. © EcoWear Privacy Policy Terms Conditions Links Home About Products Contacts Contacts eco-wear@gmail.com +91-904-5948576 Subscribe to our newsletter and follow us on social media for the latest updates on new products, promotions, and sustainability news.
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - EcoWear India EcoWear Menu Home About Products Contacts Terms and Conditions Welcome to EcoWear India. By using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please review these terms carefully. 1. Acceptance of Terms By accessing and using our website, you accept and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use our website. 2. Changes to Terms We reserve the right to change these terms and conditions at any time. Your continued use of the site after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms. 3. Use of Website You agree to use our website for lawful purposes only. You must not use our site in a way that violates any applicable laws or regulations. 4. Product Information We strive to ensure that the information on our website is accurate and complete. However, we do not warrant that product descriptions or other content is error-free. 5. Orders and Payment By placing an order on our website, you agree to provide current, complete, and accurate purchase and account information. All payments must be made through our secure payment system. 6. Shipping and Delivery We will make every effort to deliver your order within the estimated delivery time. However, we are not responsible for delays caused by external factors. 7. Returns and Refunds If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you may return it in accordance with our return policy. Please refer to our website for details on the return process. 8. Intellectual Property All content on our website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of EcoWear India and is protected by applicable copyright laws. 9. Limitation of Liability We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our website or products. 10. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold harmless EcoWear India and its affiliates from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from your use of our website or violation of these terms. 11. Governing Law These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of India. Any disputes arising from these terms will be resolved in accordance with Indian law. 12. Privacy Policy Your use of our website is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand our practices. 13. Termination We reserve the right to terminate your access to our website if you violate these terms and conditions or any applicable laws. 14. Entire Agreement These terms and conditions constitute the entire agreement between you and EcoWear India regarding your use of our website. 15. Contact Us If you have any questions about these terms and conditions, please contact us at +91-904-5948576 or eco-wear@gmail.com We are a design agency based in Houston building beautiful brands that people love, and give old brands a refresh. © EcoWear Privacy Policy Terms Conditions Links Home About Products Contacts Contacts eco-wear@gmail.com +91-904-5948576 Subscribe to our newsletter and follow us on social media for the latest updates on new products, promotions, and sustainability news.
pages.thanks: Thank You - EcoWear India Go to Home Thank You! Your message has been successfully sent. We appreciate your interest in EcoWear India and will get back to you as soon as possible. Our team is dedicated to providing excellent customer service and will respond to your inquiry with the utmost care. In the meantime, feel free to explore our website to learn more about our eco-friendly products, our commitment to sustainability, and the latest trends in eco-fashion. Thank you for choosing EcoWear India, and have a great day!
